tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited for Pregnancy Hypertension (Preeclampsia/ Eclampsia), Pre and Post Delivery Care
My wife had 2 deliveries before one failed due to some complication, the 2nd was my son, god's grace doing good. My wife wanted a girl, that would be 3rd C section. So we were looking for a doctor who can support us in all ways. Did had bad experiences while l looking for a good doctor in bangalore. Finally we met Dr Latha Shankar. She was very supportive and she made us to boost our confidence level. Her treatment was just beautiful. She is quite positive and has lots of patience which is very much needed, not to panic the patient. She is very detailed oriented and give good amount of time to listen to the patient. Difficult to find such doctor in Bangalore. She look at all aspects of the patient and then suggest the medicines. This gives women not only the medical support but emotional support as well. And as all is well we have our angel in life born, doing good. Thank you Doctor and let god help you to help many more people.

tags: None
review:
She is a very good doctor 
I delivered a girl baby in 2015
She Looks very strict but very friendly and understanding, the only time she got serious was when there is no excercise done! always pushes to excercise and be active while pregnant.. listens very patiently and her advices are very practical, she was always available on phone, she never had a second thought of C section she always tried for normal delivery and also the hospital had a unique respect for her when she was not around and were very excited to work with her, very good understanding and helpful doctor: )

tags: None
review:
She is Doctor who supported/stands with us in our bad time after my wife Delivery ,when our baby in ventilation for 15Days & guided &followed up in hospital till our baby discharged.

About Doctor profession:
1)Doctor gives time to each patient and listen to the patient *** *** ******* ********* *** **************** ********* *********
2)Best thing is she was always available on phone throughout pregnancy and  try only for normal delivery.

Overall Very good doctor. I will recommend to my friends ,relatives and too others also.

Thanks a lot "Latha Mam"

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Diseases in Pregnancy,
review:
Latha Madam, Thank you!
We have visited and visiting latha madam clinic since 4 years.
in 2015, madam started treatment as my wife having issues with thyroid and tubes issue.. in 2017 we blessed with baby girl.
in 2018 we blessed baby boy.

after 2nd delivery my wife had wound infection as she delivered in different place, madam is treating my wife now.

In one sentence about madam is "SHE IS GODDESS with STETHOSCOPE" 

Thank you Madam for everything you have taken care of my family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Latha Shankar is very good in providing the treatment and helped us in understanding the current health condition and guided us in taking the right treatment and prescribes the right medicines at the right times. Overall, BMOM Fertility center is excellent and I feel is one of the best fertility Hospital and using most advaced technology in fertility treatment. All the staff and nurses are good. I strongly recommend this hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We know this doctor for about 6 years. She is always polite in nature. Can explain to anybody in their local language which is a very good plus. She spends enough time to counsel/treat the issues. Very special for pregnancy related medical counselling. You can realize her experience just be listening her. Awesome Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She is always good and very accommodating and listens to everything in detail also checks everything in detail as she‚Äôs got good experience as well.
Very comfortable to talk too and we can tell everything to her as her advice is never offensive so makes it easier to communicate easily.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: she listens to our issues patiently and then suggests. I visited her during my pregnancy and she has taken good care also motivated to be strong when due was nearby. During labour also I had her support. I would recommend this doctor for pregnancy and other checkups.Thank you Dr. Latha. üòä- Priya Kulkarni

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: A very simple and down to earth Doctor, she is completely focused on the patient and remembers them very well. Met a doctor for the first time who is not after money but is more concerned about the patient. Doesn‚Äôt prescribe any unnecessary medication or tests unless it‚Äôs required. Very confident about the medical treatment she gives and so far it has been a good experience with Dr. Latha. Would recommend her to all those women who are looking for genuine gynaecologist.

Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is goddess for me, never seen such calm doctor in life and explains each n everything with lots of patience, she wont be over friendly but she has lots of patience to listen n explain everything, i m glad that i got treated by her, she prefers normal delivery, however i asked she has guided me that way and did normal for me, my labour was so unbearable but she did with a calm and happy face, she cool me down with her calmness, though it was tough phase she tried all her best did NVD, i m blessed, i strongly recommend her for all ladies related  issues and pregnancy, and she will not give imp to money, she charges very leas compared to other clinics,, she is very responsible towards nature, rarely we see such ppl, üôèüèºüôèüèºüôèüèºGod bless you mam, i wish you have very successful career ahead,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Painful Periods,Miscarriage,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Menstrual Disorders,Post Pregnancy Classes,
review: Took my wife for the problems during menstrual cycles. Problems had started post an termination due to abnormalities in foetus. Found the doctor in Practo and booked appointment for first visit. Doctor was very calm and listened to all our narration. Gave clear understanding of the cause. helped us to know more about the problem and the efforts we need to put. Wife was happy with treatment and explanations.medicine prescribed was not extravagant and just as much required.highly recommend the doctor.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,

Nice doc .
